name: Greenovate! Europe EEIG
goal:
Greenovate! Europe is a unique group offering a pool of more than 500 experienced innovation advisers and more than 2,000 technical experts, covering the entire innovation value chain, from research to market.

We provide support at EU level to research laboratories, technology developers, companies, investors and policy-makers. In the latter case, our goal is to support and encourage the emergence of a policy-framework in which eco-innovative businesses can thrive.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
We follow a variety of initiatives covering sustainable business. Currently this includes:

- Research and innovation framework programme (FP9)

- Circular Economy Package: Waste Directive, Packaging Waste Directive, Landfill Directive;

- Energy Union Strategy and new RES Directive for the period after 2020;

- Bioeconomy strategy, sustainability recommendations for solid and gaseous biomass.
